Name: Trinidad Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: This deep lurid reddy-brown cocktail won't be to everybody's taste but that's only to be expected with one-and-a-half shots of bitters. However, if you like cough candy then perhaps this cocktail is for you.
History: Created in 2009 by Giuseppe Gonzalez at Clover Club Bar in Brooklyn, USA and inspired by the competition-winning Trinidad Especial by Valentino Bolognese.
Nutrition: One serving of Trinidad Sour contains 145 calories
